CertificateList.CertificateName: NUS-ISS Stackable Certificate Programmes in Digital Solutions Development

CourseList.name: NICF- NUS-ISS Certificate in Digital Solutions Development - Foundations (SF)
CourseList.description: Enterprise Solution Development: C#, SQL, Object Oriented Programming, Enterprise N-Tier Application Development.

CourseList.name: NICF- NUS-ISS Certificate in Digital Solutions Development - Design (SF)
CourseList.description: Software Analysis and Design, Software Engineering

CourseList.name: NICF- NUS-ISS Certificate in Digital Solutions Development - Web Applications (SF)
CourseList.description: Web Application Development: JAVA, RESTFUL server side, web design, HTML and CSS.

CourseList.name: NICF- NUS-ISS Certificate in Digital Solutions Development - Mobility Applications (SF)
CourseList.description: Mobile Application Development: mobile application design, ASP.NET, mobile web and mobile native app using Android, HTML and CSS.

CourseList.name: NUS Graduate Diploma in Systems Analysis - Capstone & Internship
CourseList.description: Capstone project delivery and 5-months internship: gaining relevant professional experience, project management skills, and building soft skills in actual work environment.
